trans-unit.source: Describes a committable transaction.
trans-unit.target: 描述可提交的事务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> class provides an explicit way for applications to use a transaction, as opposed to using the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> class implicitly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> 类为应用程序使用事务提供了一种显式方法，而不是隐式地使用 <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> 类。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> class, the application writer needs to specifically call the <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A> and <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Rollback%2A> methods in order to commit or abort the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 与 <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> 类不同，应用程序编写器需要明确调用 <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A> 和 <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Rollback%2A> 方法以提交或中止事务。

trans-unit.source: However, only the creator of a transaction can commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 但是，只有一个事务的创建者可以提交事务。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, copies of a committable transaction, obtained through the <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Clone%2A> method are not committable.
trans-unit.target: 副本可提交的事务，因此，通过获取<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Clone%2A>方法不是可提交。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you create implicit transactions using the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> class, so that the ambient transaction context is automatically managed for you.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你创建使用隐式事务<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope>类，以便为你自动管理的环境事务上下文。

trans-unit.source: You should also use the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope> and <xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction> class for applications that require the use of the same transaction across multiple function calls or multiple thread calls.
trans-unit.target: 你还应使用<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope>和<xref:System.Transactions.DependentTransaction>跨多个函数调用或多个线程调用需要在同一事务的使用的应用程序的类。

trans-unit.source: For more information on this model, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 在此模型上的详细信息，请参阅[实现隐式事务使用事务范围](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: Creating a <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> does not automatically set the ambient transaction, which is the transaction your code executes in.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>不会自动设置环境事务，这是你的代码中执行的事务。

trans-unit.source: You can get or set the ambient transaction by calling the static <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the global <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取或设置通过调用静态的环境事务<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的全局属性<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information on ambient transactions, see the " Managing Transaction Flow using TransactionScopeOption" section of the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境事务的详细信息，请参阅的"使用 TransactionScopeOption 管理事务流"部分[实现隐式事务使用事务范围](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: If the ambient transaction is not set, any operation on a resource manager is not part of that transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置环境事务，在资源管理器上的任何操作不是该事务的一部分。

trans-unit.source: You need to explicitly set and reset the ambient transaction to ensure that resource managers operate under the right transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 你需要显式设置或重置以确保在正确的事务上下文下运行资源管理器的环境事务。

trans-unit.source: Until a <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> has been committed, all the resources involved with the transaction are still locked.
trans-unit.target: 直到<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>具有已提交，仍锁定事务所涉及的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> object cannot be reused.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> 对象不能被重用。

trans-unit.source: Once it has been committed or rolled back, it cannot be used again in a transaction or set as the current ambient transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 一旦具有已提交或回滚，不能在事务中再次使用或设置为当前的环境事务上下文。

trans-unit.source: The following sample creates two new instances of <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>, commits and rolls back them respectively.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建两个新实例<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>、 提交和汇总分别返回它们。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following sample creates a new instance of <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> and commits it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>并将它提交。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to create a transaction under Windows 98, Windows 98 Second Edition or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在 Windows 98、Windows 98 Second Edition 或 Windows Millennium Edition 下创建事务。

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of time the transaction can exist, before it is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 事务在中止之前能够存在的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction" /> class with the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <paramref name="timeout" /> 值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to create a transaction under Windows 98, Windows 98 Second Edition or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在 Windows 98、Windows 98 Second Edition 或 Windows Millennium Edition 下创建事务。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionOptions" /> structure that describes the transaction options to use for the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionOptions" /> 结构，描述用于新事务的事务选项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction" /> class with the specified transaction options.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事务选项初始化 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following sample creates a new instance of <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction> with options, and aborts it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的新实例<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction>使用选项，并中止它。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to create a transaction under Windows 98, Windows 98 Second Edition or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在 Windows 98、Windows 98 Second Edition 或 Windows Millennium Edition 下创建事务。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="options" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="options" /> 无效。

trans-unit.source: Begins an attempt to commit the transaction asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 开始异步提交事务的尝试。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> interface that can be used by the caller to check the status of the asynchronous operation, or to wait for the operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 接口，该接口可由调用方用于检查异步操作的状态，或用于等待操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method returns immediately, before the transaction has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成事务之前，此方法将立即返回。

trans-unit.source: The transaction then commits on a different thread, and the `asyncCallback` delegate is invoked when it has completed.
trans-unit.target: 然后，在另一个线程，提交此事务和`asyncCallback`完成后调用委托。

trans-unit.source: After this method is called, you do not receive the outcome of the transaction until you call <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.EndCommit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后，你不会收到事务的结果直到你调用<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.EndCommit%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The commit process may complete synchronously inside this method call.
trans-unit.target: 提交进程可能会同步完成，此方法调用中。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 尝试提交事务。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, all objects that have registered to participate in the transaction are polled and can independently indicate their vote to either commit or roll back the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法时，参与该事务已注册的所有对象进行轮询，并能够独立地指示它们对提交或回滚事务的投票。

trans-unit.source: If any participant votes to roll back the transaction, it is rolled back and this method throws a <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参与者投票回滚事务，将回滚，此方法将引发<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionException>异常。

trans-unit.source: This is a normal occurrence for a transaction and your code should catch and process such exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 为事务正常出现这种情况，你的代码应捕获和处理此类异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A> and <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.EndCommit%2A> block until the first phase of transaction processing is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A> 和<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.EndCommit%2A>阻止，直到事务处理的第一阶段已完成。

trans-unit.source: The first phase ends after all resource managers and enlistments in the transaction have voted on the transaction outcome and the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager> has durably decided to commit or abort the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 第一阶段结束后所有的资源管理器并在事务中的登记具有投票事务结果和<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager>持久决定提交或中止事务。

trans-unit.source: The second phase of processing is always asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 处理的第二阶段始终是异步的。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, there is no guarantee that data just committed from within a given transaction will be immediately available afterwards when not using another transaction to view this data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，没有能保证数据在给定的事务中提交从将立即可用之后时使用另一个事务来查看此数据。

trans-unit.source: Because this method blocks until the first phase of transaction processing is complete, you should be extremely careful when using this method in a Windows Form (WinForm) application, or a deadlock can occur.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法阻止事务处理的第一阶段完成之前，应格外小心使用此方法在 Windows 窗体 (WinForm) 应用程序或死锁时可能会发生。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method inside one WinForm Control event (for example, clicking a button), and use the synchronous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> method to direct the control to perform some UI tasks (for example, changing colors) in the middle of processing the transaction, a deadlock will happen.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用中一个 WinForm 控件事件 （例如，单击的按钮），此方法，并且使用同步<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>方法来指示要执行中间处理事务，一些 UI 任务 （例如，不断变化的颜色） 的控件死锁将发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: This is because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> method is synchronous and blocks the worker thread until the UI thread finishes its job.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>方法是同步方法，并阻止工作线程，直到用户界面线程完成其作业。

trans-unit.source: However, in our scenario, the UI thread is also waiting for the worker thread to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在我们的方案，UI 线程正在还等待工作线程以提交事务。

trans-unit.source: The result is that none is able to proceed and the scope waits indefinitely for the Commit to finish.
trans-unit.target: 结果是，所有线程都无法继续并且作用域将无限期等待完成的提交。

trans-unit.source: You should use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> rather than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> wherever possible, because it is asynchronous and thus less prone to deadlock.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>而非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>只要有可能，因为它是异步的因此不太容易发生死锁。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit" /> is called on a transaction and the transaction becomes <see cref="F:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus.InDoubt" />.
trans-unit.target: 在事务上调用了 <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit" />，并且该事务变为 <see cref="F:System.Transactions.TransactionStatus.InDoubt" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit" /> is called and the transaction rolls back for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit" />，并且该事务第一次回滚。

trans-unit.source: Ends an attempt to commit the transaction asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 结束异步提交事务的尝试。

trans-unit.source: You should call this method in the callback delegate specified as a parameter to the <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.BeginCommit%2A> method, when you have finished any cleanup work associated with the asynchronous commitment.
trans-unit.target: 在作为参数传递给指定的回调委托，应调用此方法<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.BeginCommit%2A>方法，在完成后与异步提交关联的任何清理工作。

trans-unit.source: You can also call this method early without waiting for the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 你可以提前调用此方法，而无需等待委托。

trans-unit.source: If, by the time you call this method, the transaction has not completed, this method waits for its completion.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此方法时，事务未完成，此方法将等待它完成。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult.CompletedSynchronously%2A> property returned by `asyncResult` is always `false`, even if the operation completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult.CompletedSynchronously%2A>属性返回`asyncResult`始终`false`，即使该操作同步完成。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A> and <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.EndCommit%2A> block until the first phase of transaction processing is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.Commit%2A> 和<xref:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.EndCommit%2A>阻止，直到事务处理的第一阶段已完成。

trans-unit.source: The first phase ends after all resource managers and enlistments in the transaction have voted on the transaction outcome and the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager> has durably decided to commit or abort the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 第一阶段结束后所有的资源管理器并在事务中的登记具有投票事务结果和<xref:System.Transactions.TransactionManager>持久决定提交或中止事务。

trans-unit.source: The second phase of processing is always asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 处理的第二阶段始终是异步的。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, there is no guarantee that data just committed from within a given transaction will be immediately available afterwards when not using another transaction to view this data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，没有能保证数据在给定的事务中提交从将立即可用之后时使用另一个事务来查看此数据。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.BeginCommit(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> is called and the transaction rolls back for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.BeginCommit(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />，并且该事务第一次回滚。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object provided as the last parameter of the <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.BeginCommit(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method call.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为 <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.BeginCommit(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法调用的最后一个参数而提供的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object provided as the last parameter of the <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.BeginCommit(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method call.
trans-unit.target: 作为 <see cref="M:System.Transactions.CommittableTransaction.BeginCommit(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法调用的最后一个参数而提供的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于等待异步操作完成的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 用于等待异步操作完成的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an indication of whether the asynchronous commit operation completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 获取异步提交操作是否同步完成的指示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the asynchronous commit operation completed synchronously; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果异步提交操作同步完成，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <see langword="false" /> even if the operation completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 即使该操作同步完成，此属性也始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an indication whether the asynchronous commit operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 获取异步提交操作是否已完成的指示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operation is complete; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作完成则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。
